headline: Bathing Beauty
dek: This Summer's Swimsuits Look Back To an Age Of Classic Design And Sensuality.
excerpt: Suit yourself this summer with elegant, classic swimwear.
content:
PHOTOGRAPHY By Sally Gall

White Nylon Lycra Two-Piece Suit By Esther Williams ($47).

ABOVE: Silver Nylon Lycra Two-Piece Suit By Calvin Klein ($62); Striped Bathing Cap By Whitthall And Schon ($50). Opposite: Black Crepe Lycra One-Piece Suit By Lita Bruce ($110).

OPPOSITE: Black One-Piece Back-Cross Suit By Anne Klein ($67).

ABOVE: Black Front-And-Back-Cross Suit By Anne Klein ($58).

Hair And Makeup By Linda Sembera
